short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get access to cPanel and Plesk login pages directly from websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Checks for HTTP headers that indicate that cPanel or Plesk is in use and when found provides a link to the control panel's login page at its standard location.

You can check what version of cPanel or Plesk the control panel is using and if it is outdated with our Control Panel Version Check extension, https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/control-panel-version-che/bkgcmmmkhfdobnaaepcgaojgikjilgml .

The extension is also available for Opera: https://addons.opera.com/extensions/details/control-panel-login/.
